moves.name: Confusion
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

moves.name: Zen Headbutt
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Psyshock
moves.effect: This move targets the foe's Vitality for damage calculation, instead of Insight.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.effect: For 5 rounds, all Special damage taken by the user and its allies is halved.

moves.name: Reflect
moves.effect: For 5 rounds, all Physical damage taken by the user and its allies is halved.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.effect: The user raises its Insight by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.effect: The user raises its Special and Insight by 1 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Agility
moves.effect: The user raises its Dexterity by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Teleport
moves.effect: In a wild battle, the user flees. Out of combat, the user can teleport to a previously visited, safe location.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.effect: The target falls Asleep. This move has a high chance of missing.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.effect: This move only works on a sleeping target. The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.effect: The attack strikes two turns after it is used. It can hit even if the user has fainted or switched out.

moves.name: Trick Room
moves.effect: For 5 rounds, the battlefield is warped. Slower Pokémon now act before faster Pokémon.
